sentences.en: ...the advantages of quantitative and qualitative research.
Additive variance was higher than dominance variance, which indicates quantitative inheritance.
sentences.cn: 加性的变异高于显性的变异, 表明是数量遗传.

sentences.en: Another set of misconceptions involves the quantitative description of expansion.
sentences.cn: 另一类误解牵涉到对于膨胀的定量叙述。

sentences.en: Arms races have a quantitative and a qualitative aspects.
sentences.cn: 军备竞赛具有数量和质量两个方面.

sentences.en: Business graduates must also be numerate, because most degrees will have courses in quantitative methods and statistics.
sentences.cn: 商科专业大学毕业生也必须具备良好的数学能力, 因为大部分学位涉及定量研究法和统计学领域课程.

sentences.en: He said it was only a quantitative difference.
sentences.cn: 他说这仅仅是数量上的差别.

sentences.en: In other words, operations research might be called quantitative common sense.
sentences.cn: 换言之, 作业研究可以称为计量的常识.

sentences.en: Momentum may be thought of as a quantitative expression of inertia.
sentences.cn: 动量可以被理解为惯性的定量表示.

sentences.en: Most quantitative restrictions had been removed on schedule.
sentences.cn: 数量限制大都按期予以撤消.

sentences.en: Quantitative analysis has rendered most valuable services.
sentences.cn: 定量分析已作出了极有价值的贡献.

sentences.en: Quantitative information on these aspects of protein metabolism is scarce.
sentences.cn: 有关这方面的蛋白质代谢的定量知识是贫乏的.

sentences.en: Specialized courses in quantitative analysis, often described as courses in'sanitary Chemistry ".
sentences.cn: 有关定量分析的专门化课程常常在《环境卫生化学 》 课程中讲授.

sentences.en: Surface conditions will always be a hazard in quantitative work.
sentences.cn: 地表条件在定量测定中也是个困难.

sentences.en: That's the whole difference between quantitative and qualitative research.
sentences.cn: 那就是定量研究和定性研究之间的重大差别。

sentences.en: The Supreme Court rejected this quantitative test.
sentences.cn: 最高法院驳回了这一量化检验.

sentences.en: We need to do a proper quantitative analysis of this problem.
sentences.cn: 我们需要对这个问题作一个正确的定量分析。

words.tran_cn: [数][语] 量词；数量词；精于计算的人

phrases.tran_cn: 数量性状；量标识；计量性状
数量遗传学；定量遗传学
定量法；量化方法；计量方法
定量研究；定量分析；计量研究

trans.tran_en: relating to amounts rather than to the quality or standard of something
